item.title: Jin Jiang International Hotels and Hanwha Hotels & Resorts have officially merged their loyalty programs
item.description: Jin Jiang International Hotels from China and Hanwha Hotels & Resorts from Korea have joined their loyalty programs. Starting September 1st, members of Jin Jiang’s J-Club and Hanwha’s THE PLUS will share membership benefits. This includes perks like discounts on rooms, food, and beverages, as well as late check-outs and room upgrades at both hotel groups. J-Club’s over 14 million members will also have access to Hanwha’s resorts and golf courses across Korea.

item.title: Subscribe to Grabz for exclusive insider privileges
item.description: Source: Grabz website. Grabz is a subscription service that provides its members with exclusive benefits and special offers. Using location-based alerts and a wide range of affiliated businesses, the app connects its subscribers with exclusive deals and privileges in their city. For a monthly fee of S$15.98, premium members enjoy invitations to events and promotions such as discounted business class airfare and exclusive access to limited-edition luxury watches. Premium members also get access to the Grabz Concierge, a personalized booking service that assists members with securing reservations at clubs and getting on guest lists for exclusive parties in Singapore.
